p: When a treatment is initiated in any cell i, the mosquito abundance of all cells within a distance r (the radius of the ULV-treated area) from i is rescaled by a factor 1-Δ ρ( t). This equation allows us to consider that: i) ULV treatment causes the sudden death of a proportion ρ of adult mosquitoes; ii) following ULV spraying, the mosquito population recovers as new adults emerge from pre-existing immature stages (which are not affected by adulticides), as well as from newly deposed eggs from surviving mosquitoes, as predicted by the entomological model.
